verses.verse: "Come down, <WH3381> and sit <WH3427> in the dust, <WH6083> virgin <WH1330> daughter <WH1323> of Babylon; <WH894> sit <WH3427> on the ground <WH776> without a throne, <WH3678> daughter <WH1323> of the Chaldeans: <WH3778> for you shall no more <WH3254> be called <WH7121> tender <WH7390> and delicate. <WH6028>

Take <WH3947> the millstones, <WH7347> and grind <WH2912> meal; <WH7058> remove <WH1540> your veil, <WH6777> strip <WH2834> off the train, <WH7640> uncover <WH1540> the leg, <WH7785> pass through <WH5674> the rivers. <WH5104>
Your nakedness <WH6172> shall be uncovered, <WH1540> yes, <WH2781> your shame shall be seen: <WH7200> I will take <WH3947> vengeance, <WH5359> and will spare <WH6293> no man. <WH120>"
Our Redeemer, <WH1350> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> is his name, <WH8034> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478>

"Sit <WH3427> in silence, <WH1748> and go <WH935> into darkness, <WH2822> daughter <WH1323> of the Chaldeans; <WH3778> for you shall no more <WH3254> be called <WH7121> the mistress <WH1404> of kingdoms. <WH4467>

I was angry <WH7107> with my people, <WH5971> I profaned <WH2490> my inheritance, <WH5159> and gave <WH5414> them into your hand: <WH3027> you showed <WH7760> them no mercy; <WH7356> on the aged <WH2205> you have very <WH3966> heavily <WH3513> laid your yoke. <WH5923>
You said, <WH559> <WH1404> 'I shall be a mistress forever; <WH5769>' so that you did not lay <WH7760> these things to your heart, <WH3820> nor did you remember <WH2142> the latter end of it. <WH319>

"Now therefore hear <WH8085> this, <WH5719> you who are given to pleasures, who sit <WH3427> securely, <WH983> who say <WH559> in your heart, <WH3824> <WH657> 'I am, and there is none else besides me; <WH3427> I shall not sit as a widow, <WH490> neither shall I know <WH3045> the loss of children: <WH7908>'

but these two <WH8147> things shall come <WH935> to you in a moment <WH7281> in one <WH259> day, <WH3117> the loss of children, <WH7908> and widowhood; <WH489> in their full measure <WH8537> shall they come <WH935> on you, <WH7230> in the multitude of your sorceries, <WH3785> and the great <WH3966> abundance <WH6109> of your enchantments. <WH2267>

For you have trusted <WH982> in your wickedness; <WH7451> you have said, <WH559> No one sees <WH7200> me; <WH2451> your wisdom and your knowledge, <WH1847> it has perverted <WH7725> you, <WH559> and you have said in your heart, <WH3820> I am, <WH657> and there is none else besides me.

Therefore evil <WH7451> will come <WH935> on you; <WH3045> you won't know when it dawns: <WH7837> and mischief <WH1943> will fall <WH5307> on you; <WH3201> you will not be able to put it away: <WH3722> and desolation <WH7722> shall come <WH935> on you suddenly, <WH6597> which you don't <WH3045> know.

"Stand <WH5975> now with your enchantments, <WH2267> and with the multitude <WH7230> of your sorceries, <WH3785> in which <WH834> you have labored <WH3021> from your youth; <WH5271> if so be you shall be able <WH3201> to profit, <WH3276> if so be you may prevail. <WH6206>

You are wearied <WH3811> in the multitude <WH7230> of your counsels: <WH6098> let now the astrologers, <WH1895> the stargazers, <WH2374> the monthly <WH2320> prognosticators, <WH3045> stand up, <WH5975> and save <WH3467> you from the things that shall come on you. <WH935>

Behold, <WH7179> they shall be as stubble; the fire <WH784> shall burn <WH8313> them; <WH5337> they shall not deliver themselves <WH5315> from the power <WH3027> of the flame: <WH3852> it shall not be a coal <WH1513> to warm <WH2552> at, <WH217> nor a fire to sit before. <WH3427>

Thus shall the things be to you in which you have labored: <WH3021> those who have trafficked <WH5503> with you from your youth <WH5271> shall wander <WH8582> everyone <WH376> to his quarter; <WH5676> there shall be none to save you. <WH3467>
